title: View PwC Colors — view_pwc_colors
text: ... Arguments passed scales::show_col colours character vector colours labels Label colour hex name? borders Border colour tile. Default uses par("fg"). Use border = NA omit borders. cex_label Size printed labels, multiplier default size. ncol Number columns. supplied, tries square possible.
